title.rendered: Internship Opportunities for CSE Students at Fractal, Gurgaon [Stipend Available]: Apply Now!

content.rendered:
Internship Opportunities for CSE students at Fractal, Gurgaon, as Cyber Security Intern and Project Intern. Check the eligibility and other important details below!

About Fractal

Fractal is one of the most prominent providers of Artificial Intelligence to Fortune 500® companies. Fractal’s vision is to power every human decision in the enterprise and bring AI, engineering, and design to help the world’s most admired companies. Fractal’s businesses include Crux Intelligence (AI-driven business intelligence), Eugenie.ai (AI for sustainability), Asper.ai (AI for revenue growth management) and Senseforth.ai (conversational AI for sales and customer service). Fractal incubated Qure.ai, a leading player in healthcare AI for detecting Tuberculosis and Lung cancer.

At Fractal, our goal is “powering every human decision in the enterprise.” Their partnerships and alliances help us create and deliver compelling solutions to unlock value.

They partner with companies worldwide and leaders in their respective fields. Combining Fractal’s expertise in artificial intelligence, design, engineering, and digital transformation with the data, technology, and software platforms of our partners, we create cutting-edge solutions to business problems.

Fractal understands how critical and timely decision triggers and information empowers our clients to create, unlock, deliver, and realize value. Their goal with our partners is to serve each client in their end-to-end data-to-decision journey.

Job Description

Cyber Security Intern

Intern for 3 months – 6 months in the cyber security function.

Required Skill Sets

  • Mandatory technical skills: You should have good experience in programming skills (Python, Java, C++), agile development, software testing, and logic flow in programming.
  • Mandatory non-technical skills: Problem-solving, data analysis, good communication, and interest in AI and automation of tasks.
  • Education Qualification required: MSc in IT, MTech.

Location

Gurgaon, India.

How to apply?

Interested and eligible candidates can apply via this link.

Job Description

Project Intern

The candidate will be involved in the automation products’ ideation, development and production deployment. The team follows an agile methodology for software development, and the candidate will have an opportunity to be involved in all phases of the software development life cycle.

He/she will be involved in developing all the technical artefacts of the front-end, back-end, and databases and will seek applicants with hands-on experience with multiple technologies.

He/she is expected to work in a fast-paced environment with deadlines. The position requires good teamwork skills and an independent and seeking attitude.

Skillset Required

  • Key skills: Python, MongoDB, Javascript, HTML, ReactJS, AngularJS, Nodejs, RESTful web services
  • Tools: Git, Cordova, Flask, RabbitMQ, Docker
  • Desired Knowledge: Wireframes, UX, Dynamic Programming, Algorithms, Data Structures, multi-process and micro-services architecture, security best practices
  • Communication Skills: Good verbal and written skills, able to articulate facts at hand and present ideas
  • Education: BE in Computer Science/IT.
  • Location: Gurgaon, India.

How to apply?

Eligible and interested candidates can apply via this link.

Click here to view the official notification for the Internship Opportunities for CSE students at Fractal, Gurgaon.
